channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rork’s founders were almost broke when a viral tweet led to $2.8M and a16z
item.description: Rork founders Levan Kvirkvelia and Daniel Dhawan are living a life that sounds like a plot for a movie. But it really happened. They went from broke, ...

item.title: Take a Tour of All the Essential Features in ChatGPT
item.description: If you missed WIRED's live, subscriber-only Q&A focused on the software features of ChatGPT, hosted by Reece Rogers, you can watch the replay here.

item.title: Skype shuts down after 23 years
item.description: After more than two decades, Skype is shutting down. The once-monolithic video calling platform wasn’t able to keep pace with competitors like Zoom an...

item.title: Google is making TV and movies to convince you that tech is not evil
item.description: Google is reportedly spinning up a film and TV production project called 100 Zeroes. According to a report from Business Insider, this initiative is i...

item.title: Shein Bet Big on Donald Trump. It Lost Big, Too
item.description: The fast-fashion giant launched an elaborate PR campaign in Washington, hiring at least three high-ranking Trump officials. But it wasn’t enough to sa...

item.title: 8 Best Cheap Phones (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: There’s little reason to pay top dollar for a smartphone. These iPhones and Android devices—ranging from $100 to $600—stood up to WIRED’s testing.

item.title: Sightful Spacetop for Windows Review: Spatial Computing Is Here
item.description: Paired with a laptop and smart glasses, Sightful's Spacetop for Windows software feels closer to the spatial computing future we were promised than Ap...

item.title: Apple appeals decision that forced it to allow links to external payments in apps
item.description: As promised, Apple has now filed its appeal to the recent court ruling that required it to open up its App Store to external payment mechanisms. Last ...

item.title: 9 Best Carpet Cleaners (2025): Budget, Spot Cleaners, Hard Floors
item.description: Tackle stubborn stains, ground-in grime, and pesky pet hair with one of these WIRED-tested washers.

item.title: Anthropic launches a program to support scientific research
